content.question: Which of the following aspects of the international context in which the petition was produced most likely strengthened the petitioners’ demands?

choices.label: Women’s critical contributions to the home front effort during The First World War
The adoption of woman suffrage by most industrialized Western countries in the decades preceding 1915
The growing share of women in positions of economic and political leadership as a result of the spread of universal compulsory education
The greater role women had over their reproductive rights, as a result of the spread of more effective forms of birth control

content.answer: Women’s critical contributions to the home front effort during The First World War

topic.text: 9.5: Calls for Reform and Responses after 1900

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
